anathema: Deny a flying creature the ability to fly, abuse Pazuzu’s name or call on Pazuzu for help, aid worshippers of  Lamashtu
edict: Tempt others to immoral acts, revel in flight, possess or magically influence others to cause calamities
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Pazuzu (King of the Wind Demons)](/Deities.aspx?ID=434)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 304

Pazuzu, King of the Wind Demons, is the demon lord of the sky, temptation, and winged creatures. He counts himself among the most ancient of demon lords, though his constant warring with [Lamashtu](/Deities.aspx?ID=287) has hindered his accumulation of power to the point of denying him godhood. He is exceptionally active in meddling in mortal affairs and takes great pleasure in possessing and corrupting good-hearted folk who invoke his name. Pazuzu appears as a humanoid figure with [eagle’s](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=406) talons, two pairs of bird wings, a [scorpion](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=466) tail, and an avian [demonic](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=387) head. He is worshipped by [harpies](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3046), other evil winged creatures, and by countless [champions](/Classes.aspx?ID=58) and [clerics](/Classes.aspx?ID=33) who fell from grace at his temptations.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Tempt others to immoral acts, revel in flight, possess or magically influence others to cause calamities

**Anathema** Deny a flying creature the ability to fly, abuse Pazuzu’s name or call on Pazuzu for help, aid worshippers of [Lamashtu](/Deities.aspx?ID=287)

**Area of Concern**
The sky, temptation, winged creatures

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39)

**Favored Weapon** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=386)

**Domains** [Air](/Domains.aspx?ID=65), [Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=120), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=96)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1550)

- **4th**
[Aerial Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1437)

- **8th**
[Migration](/Spells.aspx?ID=1600)
(transforms into flying creatures)

</column>
name: Pazuzu (King of the Wind Demons)
